title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5006.2 - Method of play
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5006.2 - Method of play

State Regulations

Tickets of any instant lottery game shall be played by
removing the rub-off coating from play spots. The specific method of play will
be published for each game in a game brochure readily available to the
public. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5006.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
